name: Milkshake Media
description: Founded in 1999, Milkshake is based in Austin, Texas. For over 18 years, Milkshake has been delivering unparalleled creative solutions to its clients under the leadership of founder Kat Jones who serves as the lead strategist and creative advisor. We’ve evolved from a small agency to a focused strategic consultancy working with an established network of experts. This approach allows us to build exactly the right team for each client’s needs.
